Name: Divine Favor
About the game: A man wakes up in Heaven. Divine Favor is a short (5-10 minute) kinetic novel that follows the story of Leon Montgomery, and the events following his untimely death. Bathed in darkness, with only the voice of a kindly old man to guide him, Leon has no choice but to acclimate to his new surroundings... but since this is Heaven, that shouldn't be a problem... right?
